title.native: 君は放課後インソムニア

description:
Ganta Nakami is a high school student who suffers from insomnia. One day, he meets Isaki Magari, a girl with the same condition. A strange, but special relationship forms as they share a secret and catch up on their sleep in their school’s abandoned observatory…

(Source: HIDIVE)
hashtag: #君ソム #君は放課後インソムニア
synonyms: ถ้านอนไม่หลับไปนับดาวกันไหม

tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Photography
tags.description: Centers around the use of cameras to capture photos.

tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

tags.description: Features the recreational activity of camping, either in a tent, vehicle, or simply sleeping outdoors.

tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

title.native: 君は放課後インソムニア
君は放課後インソムニア　スペシャルアニメーションPV

node.description:
__Alma Mater:__ Toyo University

__[Website](https://www.yukihayashi.net/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hayayu1231)__

__Introduction:__
Yuuki Hayashi is a Japanese composer and arranger affiliated with Legendoor, who used to be a rhythmic gymnast

__Biography:__
His history in music began in university when he started creating music pieces for rhythmic gymnasts as a hobby for 5000 yen a piece. When he started getting requests from other universities for his music, his interest in music producing grew. After graduation, he was taught music for 6 months by a rhythmic gymnastics music producer, and now, he handles music for various sports. He also arranges music for dance, athletic competitions, companies, independent movies and recently, TV dramas and anime.

(Source: MyAnimeList, edited)
Emiko Onodera is a digital painter.
In-betweener turned CG artist. Formerly affiliated with [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/).

[Website](https://aiko.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/aiko_dochibi) | [Instagram]() | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/aikoOfficial)

**[Official Website](https://homecomings.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/homcomi) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/_homecomings_/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@HomecomingsCH)**

Japanese rock band formed in 2012. The members met at Kyoto Seika University's folk music club. 

__Members:__
- [Ayaka Tatamino](https://anilist.co/staff/299891) (畳野彩加) - Guitar/Vocals
- [Yuki Fukutomi](https://anilist.co/staff/299892) (福富優樹) - Guitar
- Honami Fukuda (福田穂那美) - Bass/Chorus
- Narumi Ishida (石田成美) - Drums/Chorus

**[Official Website](https://homecomings.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/homcomi) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/_homecomings_/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@HomecomingsCH)**

__Members:__
- [Ayaka Tatamino](https://anilist.co/staff/299891) (畳野彩加) - Guitar/Vocals

**[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tataminoayak/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/t_t_mn)**

Vocals and guitar for Japanese rock band [Homecomings](https://anilist.co/staff/299890).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/福田道生)

Originating from [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/). Debuted as a director on [Hyakko](https://anilist.co/anime/4550/).
